For me, the neckline is a little high on this blouse (definitely higher than pictured on the model), and it just creates an overall awkward fit. It's boxier than I anticipated, which I genuinely thing has to do with where the neckline sits. The sleeves puff up more than I thought they would at the shoulders, which I don't really care for.  The thing I really like about this blouse, though, is the color. I got the green, and it's a nice rich, deep color. It's exactly as pictured.  I wish I liked this top better. I was seeking pieces I would wear in and out of the office, but I'm just not sure how much use I'll get because I don't feel confident in it due to the fit on me.

类型: Special Size: Long SleeveSize: LargeColor: Apricot
评论详情: Now this is a casual elegant blouse that looks great on me. It’s very flattering, comforting, and the material is soft and isn’t itchy at all. It definitely is wrinkle resistant as well I thought I would have to steam it but so far just wash it take it out the dryer and it’s wrinkle free. I ordered two sizes up extra large for a looser fit.

类型: Special Size: Long SleeveSize: MediumColor: Peacock Blue
评论详情: This top is feels rich - both the material and the color. It doesn't wrinkle easily and the wide neck opening makes it easy to put on. I like that it's versatile and can be dressed up with a jacket and skirt or dressed down with jeans.

Lovely rich dark green pull over the head top. Very nice top for special occasion wear. Top was ironed but does seem like it will wrinkle easily, also satin is a delicate fabric. The neckline is well-done, bottom hem and sleeves are turned under and top-stitched, appearance is OK. Size small fits me even through I fall in the medium category based on the size chart. I did not want a boxy fit (135 lbs, 5’ 6”), sleeves are long and top is not tight. Well designed top that can be worn to the office and looks dressy for evening wear.

评论概述: soft but polyester and no curves.
评论详情: Made of soft polyester so not breathable at all but color is beautiful. There are no cuts/curves, so fitting is loose and you have to style it to look good. Decent price.

This top  is great value, the material has a lovely soft silky feel, medium weight, and the Peacock blue is just lovely.  It runs small, so best to order up a size. This top is quite versatile, would look good casually with jeans, or dressed up with pants or a skirt..
